title: Remove All Adjacent Duplicates in String II
content:
Given a string , a k duplicate removal consists of choosing  adjacent and equal letters from  and removing them causing the left and the right side of the deleted substring to concatenate together.
We repeatedly make  duplicate removals on  until we no longer can.
Return the final string after all such duplicate removals have been made.
It is guaranteed that the answer is unique.
 






 




 only contains lower case English letters.
